:star2: Task 5: Git & Github

Dont think git is hard to learn üôÇ

Learning Git is like discovering a secret codebook for developers. It‚Äôs a powerful tool that helps you keep track of changes in your code, collaborate with others seamlessly, and undo mistakes with the flick of a virtual wand. With Git, you can create branches to work on different features simultaneously, merge them back together effortlessly, and explore alternate realities of your project. It may take a moment to wrap your head around its quirks, but once you do, Git becomes your trusty sidekick, saving you from coding catastrophes and ensuring smooth collaboration with fellow developers. So, embrace the Git magic and unlock a whole new world of version control wizardry!

:pushpin: Challenge

Create a repository. Explore and experiment with the git. Refer the youtube playlist below.

Host your Task 4 Mini Project on Github using Github Pages and submit the link to the project in the form.
Follow the tutorial here to learn more about hosting using Github pages.
